Title: There are apparently $3072$ ways to draw this flower. But why?
Content:

I'd be glad if someone showed how to show that there are exactly $3072$ ways to draw this flower, starting from the center of the petals, without lifting the pen (assuming that $3072$ is the correct amount).
AcceptedAnswer: First you have to draw the petals.  There are $4!=24$ ways to choose the order of the petals and $2^4=16$ ways to choose the direction you go around each petal.  Then you go down the stem to the leaves.  There are $2! \cdot 2^2=8$ ways to draw the leaves.  Finally you draw the lower stem.  $24 \cdot 16 \cdot 8=3072$
